message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $900000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm happy to pay $750000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value we both see in it.

I understand that $750000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and offer it to you for $825000. This is a fair price that balances the value of the product with your budget constraints.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $825000 is closer, I'm still hoping to land closer to my initial offer.  I'm willing to pay $780000 for the product. This is a fair price, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're looking to get closer to your initial offer, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $820000. I'm willing to make a compromise and meet you at $810000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I believe it's still a fair price for the product.
